name: tutoring-center-hours
description: Clarifies tutoring center drop-in hours for CSC 123.

events.content: Do we know the updated tutoring center hours for CSC 123? The website still shows fall times.
Spring hours just changed: Mon/Wed 1-5 p.m., Tue/Thu 10-2 p.m. in 14-302. Fridays are virtual only.
You can still book a zoom slot via https://csc-tutoring.calpoly.edu if the in-person seats fill up.
Thanks! Dropping by tomorrow after lab.
